Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: leprechaun \leprechaun\ n. (Irish folklore) A small mischevous elf or spirit in Irish folklore; it is often depicted in literature as a dwarfish bearded old man; -- legend tells that if a leprechaun is captured, he will reveal the location of his hidden pot of gold. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
leprechaun n : a mischievous elf in Irish folklore
